name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】一番星の推し[あなた]へ届ける⇒ 『LETTER☆彡』【#白上フブキ生誕祭2023】 [7995orE5Enc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs the song 'Letter' on a stage adorned with memories.
White Burinyan presents the 2023 Birthday Celebration Goods in a special segment.
Shirakami Fubuki returns to the stage in a new outfit to perform a cover of 'Seiza ni naretara'.

subtitles.original: ...ありがとう
subtitles.english: ...Thank you.

subtitles.original: あなたの願いと　祈りと　迷いと
subtitles.english: Along with your wishes, prayers, and hesitations,

subtitles.original: 孤独と　夢と　明日と　僕も共に生きるよ
subtitles.english: Loneliness, dreams, and the future, I will live through them with you.

subtitles.original: あなたがその想いをくれたんだよ
subtitles.english: Because you gave those feelings to me.

subtitles.original: 「あなたに会えてよかった」なんて
subtitles.english: Saying things like, "I'm glad I met you,"

subtitles.original: どうでもいいほど当たり前でさ
subtitles.english: is so obvious it's almost trivial.

subtitles.original: だけどね　言わなきゃね　死んじゃうから僕らは
subtitles.english: But I have to say it, because we're mortal after all.

subtitles.original: ありがとね
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: あいしてる
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: ライブの途中ですがッチャー！
subtitles.english: Sorry for the interruption during the live!

subtitles.original: グッズ紹介担当のホワイトブリニャンだにゃ！
subtitles.english: I'm White Burinyan, in charge of goods promotion, nya!

subtitles.original: 監獄から収録とか意味わかんないけど、
subtitles.english: I don't get why I'm recording from prison, but...

subtitles.original: まあシゴデキなところ見せちゃおうかにゃ？
subtitles.english: ...I guess I'll show you how efficient I am, nya?

subtitles.original: 緊張しすぎてMCで喋ることほぼ喋れてない
subtitles.english: On behalf of the poor Fubunyan who's so nervous

subtitles.original: 可哀想なフブニャンに代わってお知らせです！
subtitles.english: she barely said anything she planned for her MC!

subtitles.original: 今年もございます！2023年誕生日記念グッズ！
subtitles.english: They're here again! The 2023 Birthday Celebration Goods!

subtitles.original: ブリニャンのためにいっぱい買ってね！
subtitles.english: Buy lots of them for Burinyan's sake, okay!

subtitles.original: まずはこちら、
subtitles.english: First up is this:

subtitles.original: みんなでだらだらアクリルジオラマスタンド！
subtitles.english: The "Lazily Together Acrylic Diorama Stand"!

subtitles.original: イラストはりぃちゅさんが担当してくれました。
subtitles.english: The illustration was done by Riichu-san.

subtitles.original: こういうジオラマってキャラクターと背景の間に
subtitles.english: With these kinds of dioramas, you can slip postcards

subtitles.original: ポストカードとかチェキとか挟んで立て掛けられたり、
subtitles.english: or chekis between the characters and the background...

subtitles.original: インテリアとしても使えるんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: ...so you can use it as interior decor too, right?

subtitles.original: あれれ？もしかしてブリニャン天才じゃん？
subtitles.english: Oh? Is Burinyan a genius or what?

subtitles.original: 新衣装のお部屋スタイルでだらだら〜なデザインとなってま〜す！
subtitles.english: It's a "lazy" design featuring her loungewear outfit!

subtitles.original: 続いては、
subtitles.english: Moving on:

subtitles.original: バックステージパスケース！
subtitles.english: The "Backstage Pass Case"!

subtitles.original: ライブをお手伝いしてくれるスタッフすこん部君になれちゃうぞい！
subtitles.english: You can become a Staff Sukonbu-kun helping out with the live!

subtitles.original: イベントなどで名刺として使うもよし、
subtitles.english: You can use it for business cards at events,

subtitles.original: お仕事などでも使える人は使ってね！
subtitles.english: or use it at work if you can!

subtitles.original: ブリニャンも担当君にプレゼントしちゃおかな、
subtitles.english: Maybe Burinyan will give one to her manager...

subtitles.original: 名前はもちろんブリニャン！ってつける。
subtitles.english: ...I'll write "Burinyan!" as the name, obviously.

subtitles.original: すこん部君のお耳の再現もすごいね！
subtitles.english: The reproduction of Sukonbu-kun's ears is amazing!

subtitles.original: 裏面はなんか前にフブニャンがみんなと話し合って
subtitles.english: For the back, Fubunyan talked with everyone before

subtitles.original: こういうのいいねっていうのを取り入れたんだって、
subtitles.english: and incorporated things they thought would be cool.

subtitles.original: シゴデキじゃん、えらピッピ！
subtitles.english: So efficient! Good job!

subtitles.original: 洋服衣装のスカートにあるデザインが型押しで入ってるよ！
subtitles.english: It's embossed with the design from her skirt!

subtitles.original: 続いて！ランダムラバーキーホルダー！
subtitles.english: Next! The "Random Rubber Keychain"!

subtitles.original: イラストはやなのんさんが担当！
subtitles.english: The illustration is by Yananan-san!

subtitles.original: 超絶最高なラバーキーホルダー！
subtitles.english: These are absolute top-tier rubber keychains!

subtitles.original: かわちくてブリニャンこれ大好き！
subtitles.english: They're so cute, Burinyan loves them!

subtitles.original: 通常衣装、部屋着衣装、洋服衣装に
subtitles.english: There are keychains for her standard, loungewear,

subtitles.original: フブらコスプレのラバーキーホルダー！
subtitles.english: and dress outfits, plus a Fubura cosplay one!

subtitles.original: オタク君の鞄につけるもよし、
subtitles.english: You can put them on your bag, Otaku-kun,

subtitles.original: さっきのバックステージパスにつけるのもいいかも！
subtitles.english: or even on that backstage pass from earlier!

subtitles.original: ちなみに汚れたラバーキーホルダーには
subtitles.english: By the way, I heard if a rubber keychain gets dirty,

subtitles.original: 除光液を綿棒につけて擦るといいらしいって聞いたんだけど、ガチ？
subtitles.english: you can clean it with nail polish remover on a Q-tip. Is that legit?

subtitles.original: 最後は、まさかの、フブキの部屋着ジャージ！
subtitles.english: Lastly, believe it or not: Fubuki's Loungewear Jersey!

subtitles.original: ひぇ〜ブリニャンも欲し〜！
subtitles.english: Whoa~ Burinyan wants one too!

subtitles.original: 男女兼用サイズだから、担当君にも着せられちゃうね！
subtitles.english: It's unisex, so I can make my manager wear it too!

subtitles.original: 普段使いしやすいシンプルなデザインだし、
subtitles.english: It's a simple design that's easy to wear daily,

subtitles.original: これまで出したTシャツにも合うんじゃないかにゃ？
subtitles.english: and I bet it'll go well with previous T-shirts too, nya!

subtitles.original: オタク君たちのジャージ姿、ブリニャンも見てみたいにゃ！
subtitles.english: Burinyan wants to see you Otaku-kuns in your jerseys, nya!

subtitles.original: ねえ、お揃っちにしようにゃ！
subtitles.english: Hey, let's get matching ones, nya!

subtitles.original: は？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: 今嫌だって言った？
subtitles.english: Did you just say "no thanks"?

subtitles.original: そして今回もございます！
subtitles.english: And we have it this time as well!

subtitles.original: 数量限定フルセット購入特典、直筆サインにゃ！
subtitles.english: The limited edition full set purchase bonus: an autograph, nya!

subtitles.original: 今回は初のチェキ風ブロマイド！
subtitles.english: This time, it's our first cheki-style bromide!

subtitles.original: 見てこれ、寝顔ふにゃふにゃで超うけ！
subtitles.english: Look at this, her sleeping face is so soft, it's hilarious!

subtitles.original: アイドルの寝起きが激写ってこと？
subtitles.english: A candid shot of an idol waking up?

subtitles.original: 究極のお宝じゃん！
subtitles.english: This is the ultimate treasure!

subtitles.original: まあブリニャンはこういう寝顔とか絶対見せないけどね！
subtitles.english: Though Burinyan would never show a sleeping face like that!

subtitles.original: 以上、今年の誕生日グッズの紹介でした！
subtitles.english: That's all for this year's birthday goods!

subtitles.original: 引き続きライブを楽しんでいってくださいにゃ！
subtitles.english: Please continue to enjoy the live, nya!

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は６時
subtitles.english: The clock is almost at six.

subtitles.original: もうそこに一番星
subtitles.english: The first star is already there.

subtitles.original: 影を踏んで
subtitles.english: Stepping on shadows,

subtitles.original: 夜に紛れたくなる
subtitles.english: wanting to disappear into the night,

subtitles.original: 帰り道
subtitles.english: on the way home.

subtitles.original: どんなに探してみても
subtitles.english: No matter how much I look for it...
